long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin is designed to help generate charities or non profit organizations to generate some extra revenue though amazon affiliate network. This plugin embed the affiliate tag to all the amazon links. This then can be installed on charities fans.
